snippet.title: Police Simulator: Highway Patrol Expansion - Launch Trailer | Games Baked in Germany Showcase
snippet.description:
Discover the Police Simulator: Patrol Officers expansion Highway Patrol and extend your patrol area! Explore the diverse surroundings and beauty of the wider State of Franklin as you engage in intense highway chases, deploy fast-paced PIT maneuvers to tactically stop fleeing suspects who are in violation of the law, and enjoy a more dynamic police simulation experience.

The Police Simulator: Highway Patrol Expansion is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam). Visit Steam and add it to your wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2350410/Police_Simulator_Patrol_Officers_Highway_P
atrol_Expansion/
